title: Aalu Bhujia
description: These tiny spicy potato noodle shaped savory is crispy, tangy and lightly spiced. Have it anytime or enjoy them most with a cup of tea.

title: Bhujia Sev

title: Chana Dal
description: Prepared with authentic Indian recipe, these crispy and spicy chana beads simply delight your taste buds.

title: Popcorn (Tomato)
description: Sweet, tangy tomatoes give our healthy snack a mouth-watering taste.

title: Popcorn (Pizza)
description: Best of both worlds! An interesting combination of pizza flavor in popcorn.

title: Popcorn (Better Salted)
description: Popcorn and good times go hand-in-hand. An all-time favorite snack in buttery flavor.

title: Popcorn (Salted)
